bike.description: Demo 8 FSR M5 manipulated alloy, 8.2" travel, 26" F/R wheel, asymetrical rear triangle, ISCG mount, adj geometry, 1- 1/8" forged HT, cartrifge bearing rear shock mount, rear derailleur protector

components.description: Fox DHX 5.0 coil 8.75x2.75", adjustable rebound, ProPedal, bottom out control, and IFP pressure
Thomson SPE127/8, straight w/ 12degree clamp, S/M:367mm, L/XL:410mm
